snippet: Jonathan Tiernan-Locke became the first home winner of the Tour of Britain in 19 years after finishing safely in the main pack in the final stage, which was won by his compatriot Mark Cavendish.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Tiernan-Locke became the first home winner of the Tour of Britain in 19 years after finishing safely in the main pack in the final stage, which was won by his compatriot Mark Cavendish.

headline.main: A Briton Wins the Tour of Britain
headline.print_headline: A Briton Wins the Tour of Britain
